channel.title: My list of abbreviation's
channel.description:
heres a list of few letters with another meaning.
games:
GG: good game /great game hf: have fun gl: good luck ftw: for the win ftl: for the loose ally: aliance member hf & gl: have fun and good luck leaver(s): a person who enters the game and then leave in the middle of game or like q: quest npc: non player controlet wep: weapon gj: good job ding: level up str: strengt def: defence agi: agility lvl: level wc: woodcutting wsg: warsong gulch bg: battleground wc: warcraft wc III ft: warcraft 3 frozen throne
mostly used: omg: oh my god/godness omfg: oh my f****** god wtf: what the/tha f*** hs: holy s*** ffs: for f***s sake dang/crap/doh/dam/damn: erhm dunno how to explain ^^ erhm being sayd after a bad thing happent? shise/sheise: german for s***
country codes dk: denmark/danmark de: germany/deucthlande nl: nederland/?????? us/usa: united states of america en/eng: england/england ru/rf: russia/russin federation it: italy/??????? sp: spain/?????? uk: united kingdoms/england au: austria/australia aus: australia fr: france
misc: lol: laughting out laud rofl: rolling of floor laughting out laud rotflol: rolling on the floor laughting out laud cya/cu: see you/see ya u: you ofc: of course
will add more when i get them lol hope they can help you out sometime.

item.title: My list of abbreviation's
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

[quote=“pookey71, post:15, topic:65717”][quote author=iamafisher link=topic=95574.msg988553#msg988553 date=1173461381]

They’re called “abbreviation’s.”

I second that, Pookey is a retard, you always have been. Get your 12 year old ass BACK to moparscape.
[/quote]

Erm why is this here? More to the point why are you spamming this forums with this? Change to title to “Words and there meanings”.Also use capitals and the like.Makes you seem more professional.

Stange i never saw anything to do with “Abbreviation’s”.So ethier get thicker glasses or learn how to read thank you.[/quote]
If he gets thicker glasses, he’ll look emo

Read full topic

item.title: My list of abbreviation's
item.dc:creator: @nicodk nicodk
item.description:
@nicodk wrote:

heres a list of few letters with another meaning.

games:

GG: good game /great game
hf: have fun
gl: good luck
ftw: for the win
ftl: for the loose
ally: aliance member
hf & gl: have fun and good luck
leaver(s): a person who enters the game and then leave in the middle of game or like
q: quest
npc: non player controlet
wep: weapon
gj: good job
ding: level up
str: strengt
def: defence
agi: agility
lvl: level
wc: woodcutting
wsg: warsong gulch
bg: battleground
wc: warcraft
wc III ft: warcraft 3 frozen throne

mostly used:
omg: oh my god/godness
omfg: oh my f****** god
wtf: what the/tha f***
hs: holy s***
ffs: for f***s sake
dang/crap/doh/dam/damn: erhm dunno how to explain ^^ erhm being sayd after a bad thing happent?
shise/sheise: german for s***

country codes
dk: denmark/danmark
de: germany/deucthlande
nl: nederland/???
us/usa: united states of america
en/eng: england/england
ru/rf: russia/russin federation
it: italy/???
sp: spain/???
uk: united kingdoms/england
au: austria/australia
aus: australia
fr: france

misc:
lol: laughting out laud
rofl: rolling of floor laughting out laud
rotflol: rolling on the floor laughting out laud
cya/cu: see you/see ya
u: you
ofc: of course

will add more when i get them lol hope they can help you out sometime.

Read full topic
